doc:
Andrew McCarthy https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Andrew_McCarthy 0 Andrew Thomas McCarthy (born November 29, 1962) is an American actor, travel writer and television director. He is most known for his roles in 1980s films such as St. Elmo's Fire, Pretty in Pink, and Less Than Zero. He is ranked #40 on VH1's 100 Greatest Teen Stars of all-time list. As a director he is known for his work on the Emmy Award-winning series Orange Is the New Black. Andrew_Thomas_McCarthy ( born November_29_,_1962 ) is an_American_actor , travel_writer_and_television_director . He is_most_known for his_roles in 1980s_films such_as St._Elmo 's_Fire , Pretty in Pink , and Less Than Zero . He is_ranked #_40 on VH1 's_100_Greatest_Teen_Stars of all-time_list . As a_director he is_known for his_work on the_Emmy_Award-winning_series_Orange Is the_New_Black .
